---
name: Question / Clarification / Concern
about: Ask a grounded question or raise a concern about existing Aegis documents or behavior
title: "[Clarification] "
labels: clarification
assignees: ''
---

## What are you asking about?
Briefly describe the question, clarification, or concern.

## Which document(s) does this relate to?
Please reference one or more of the following (by filename and section if possible):
- AEGIS_CANON.md
- AEGIS_META_INDEX.md
- AEGIS_SECURITY_MODEL.md
- AEGIS_INTENT_CARD_SPEC.md
- Other (please specify)

## What is unclear, concerning, or potentially inconsistent?
Explain precisely what you think may be unclear, conflicting, or risky.

## What assumptions are you making?
List any assumptions you are bringing to this question.

## Additional context (optional)
Any extra context that may help evaluate this issue.

---

**Note:**  
Aegis is a mediation-first, governance-driven system.  
Feature requests, autonomy proposals, or implementation rewrites that are not grounded in existing documents may be closed without action.
